lines.text: declare map from long long to long long mp
lines.code: map < long long , long long > mp ;

lines.text: declare lca with long longs u , v , w default 0 as arguments , returning long long
lines.code: long long lca ( long long u , long long v , long long w = 0 )

lines.text: if v is less than u , swap values between u and v
lines.code: if ( v < u ) swap ( u , v ) ;

lines.text: if first index of v in mp is not end of mp , increment ans by mp [ v ]
lines.code: if ( mp . find ( v ) != mp . end ( ) ) ans += mp [ v ] ;

lines.text: if w is true , increment mp [ v ] by w
declare long longs u , v , w
print result of run lcu ( u , v ) and newline
